body:
I believe it's been decided that the `+fpic` variant should be called `+pic` instead.  Someone needs to do a global search-and-replace on the Spack repo to get all packages in line.  Something like:
```
sed -i.bak 's/fpic/pic/g' */package.py
```

Also, packages need to be checked, and changed if needed, to follow #2375
title: Standardize `+fpic` to `+pic`
